title: WHEN IS FIZZ GETTING NERFED
body: ENOUGH OF THIS SHIT. NERF THIS CANCER ALREADY.

replies.body: I think he's just fine,  he gotta jump in the melee, if he use dodge for escape he loses a lot of damage. He's quite touchy.

> I think he's just fine,  he gotta jump in the melee, if he use dodge for escape he loses a lot of damage. He's quite touchy.

ok.. thats every melee tho. he has pots for that reason. also while he loses a lot of damage, the enemy loses a lot of pressure. also fizz can e back to do damage WHILE dodging the skillshot .

> ok.. thats every melee tho

Most melee aren,t as squishy as Fizz

>he has pots for that reason

ok.. thats every melee tho

>also while he loses a lot of damage, the enemy loses a lot of pressure. also fizz can e back to do damage WHILE dodging the skillshot.

He is an assassin, that's what assassin's do, and so many champions of all kind can do things like that, Trist Jump reseting, Lee Sin in and out, Ahri triple dash, Leblanc double dash and on and on.

The thing is most people crying about Fizz never played him and have no idea how you have to calculate everything or you end up in a bad spot and that's it for you.

He has an invulnerability jump that slows, does massive aoe damage, and has a 5 second cd at rank 5. 

You are high as fuq if you think Fizz is balanced

> Most melee aren,t as squishy as 

Every melee assassin is.

> He is an assassin, that's what assassin's do, and so many champions of all kind can do things like that, Trist Jump reseting, Lee Sin in and out, Ahri triple dash, Leblanc double dash and on and on.

None of those make them immune to damage/CC at all.
Itis an escape, but its vulnerable to CC and damage while it is being done.
And thats why I ban him every chance I get. He's way too safe and cheap. Get Sheen and there is enough damage to instant kill adcs.
he'll get nerfed when Riot catches him... which won't be for a while if he built 40% CDR or he found a way to get U.R.F.ed

Hes totally not cancer....



/s Nerf him to the ground. He needs a rework to balance out his kit, same goes for yasuo and akali.

> Hes totally not cancer....
> 
> 
> 
> /s Nerf him to the ground. He needs a rework to balance out his kit, same goes for yasuo and akali.

also they need to remove the increase on mr so fucking zed can have a chance vs ap .

> > Hes totally not cancer....
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > /s Nerf him to the ground. He needs a rework to balance out his kit, same goes for yasuo and akali.
> 
> also they need to remove the increase on mr so fucking zed can have a chance vs ap .

Probably. I think they need to rework him to be basically a AP version of Zed. 

Im fine with a whole mobility but hes too resilient. As soon as he takes out a objective (The ADC) he should be at a very high risk of dying. 

As he stands he does his job of assassinating the ADC but he just goes Invulnerable before he can be shutdown and just goes ham on the now Damage-less enemy team.
zed has always had a chance vs ap ;l
i thought fizz was bullshit then i saw some cowsep master yi montages and im lyke... this mtherfker is way worse than fizz lol

> i thought fizz was bullshit then i saw some cowsep master yi montages and im lyke... this mtherfker is way worse than fizz lol

yi doesnt get to go invulnerable and do what he wants throughout the enitre game. fucking riot has down syndrome if they dont nerf him next patch. im seriously furious as to hwo they keep releasing anti melee making us as useless as possible then they leave fizz to YOLO all over the map.
yes fizz is pretty bad... yi is pretty much the high reflex required version of fizz lol as his invulnerability time is much shorter

> yes fizz is pretty bad... yi is pretty much the high reflex required version of fizz lol as his invulnerability time is much shorter

Except his invulnerability is more of a gap-closer than used to dodge skill-shots. You need a very high proficiency with the champ to just dodge a heavy amount of CC as yi.

Just gon leave it at, Im agreeing with you 
*cough* high reflex required version of fizz* cough*
and I started something abit irrelevant to the topic
If Fizz will get nerfed, then what happens to Akali?

> If Fizz will get nerfed, then what happens to Akali?

Dont nerf either. Rework Akali, Yasuo, fizz and the rest of the cancer assassins that became meta last season. For fucks sake we need to see an equal amount of Mages to Assassins because where else would they go? Right now it feels like the only champions that are picked in Mid are assassin champs.

> 
> Dont nerf either. Rework Akali, Yasuo, fizz and the rest of the cancer assassins that became meta last season. For fucks sake we need to see an equal amount of Mages to Assassins because where else would they go? Right now it feels like the only champions that are picked in Mid are assassin champs.

yes, but zed has counterplay, u get armguard and his damage is reduced BY A TON. fizz gets more and more ap AND armor with how balanced ap itemization is while zed gets more damage and minimal mr that just got nerfed so that u cunts can 1 shot us more.
THE BITCHH DOES BACKFLIPS

Fizz doesn't need nerf. Learn how to counter him. It's pretty easy to predict his moves. 

Worst comes to worst, play passive and wait for him to attack first / attack minions and you will be fine.

> Fizz doesn't need nerf. Learn how to counter him. It's pretty easy to predict his moves. 
> 
> Worst comes to worst, play passive and wait for him to attack first / attack minions and you will be fine.

yes by waiting for him to attack minions, i have a chance to win when he goes on me. nice advice. until i get a LEGIT tip on how to counter this uncounterable cancer that uses the cancer that is zhonyas to do cancer damage, i wont stop complaining.

> > Fizz doesn't need nerf. Learn how to counter him. It's pretty easy to predict his moves. 
> > 
> > Worst comes to worst, play passive and wait for him to attack first / attack minions and you will be fine.
> 
> yes by waiting for him to attack minions, i have a chance to win when he goes on me. nice advice. until i get a LEGIT tip on how to counter this uncounterable cancer that uses the cancer that is zhonyas to do cancer damage, i wont stop complaining.

Enough with Cancer already, you take it like a joke when you have no idea what lives it's taken.

Anyways, if you want to fully counter a Fizz, there's always a Mordekaiser sitting in the Store.
